page.title: 20 My Dad's a Commuter
page.content:
From Monday to Friday every week my dad drives to work at Sunbury on Thames, London. We live in Farnham, it is quite expensive with the cost of petrol so my dad and about four of his friends from work do a 'car swap'.This means that one person drives the rest to work one week, then another person drives another week. So in the long run they only have to drive to work one week in five. It is about 33 miles to where my dad works so he leaves home at about 7:30 and gets home at about 6:00. In the dictionary the word commuter means someone who travels by bus, car or train to work and back everyday.
{This work was compiled by Class {32Y Heron Wood Comprehensive School {and William Cobbett Middle School with {assistance from Barfield School Runfol
